text: The following is a list of people executed by the U.S. state of New Hampshire from 1739 to 1939. Capital punishment was abolished in New Hampshire on May 30, 2019. {|class="wikitable" |- !# !Name !Age !Date of execution !Location !Crime |- |1||Sarah Simpson||||December 27, 1739||Portsmouth||feloniously concealing death of infant bastard child |---- |2||Penelope Kenny||||December 27, 1739||Portsmouth||feloniously concealing death of infant bastard child |---- |3||Eliphaz Dow||50||May 8, 1755||Portsmouth||murder |---- |4||Ruth Blay||31||December 30, 1768||||concealing the death of newborn |---- |5||Elisha Thomas||||June 3, 1788||||murder |---- |6||Thomas Powers||||July 28, 1796||||rape |---- |7||Josiah Burnham||63||August 12, 1806||||murder |---- ||8||Daniel Farmer||28||January 03, 1822||AmherstGeorge Hadley, History of the Town of Goffstown, 1733-1820 (Rumford Press, 1924)||murder |---- |9||Abraham Prescott||18||January 6, 1836||||rape/murder |---- |10||Andrew Howard||||July 8, 1846||||robbery/murder |---- |11||Rev.
